about_the_game:
A group of travelers has left their home and is trying to restart their lives in a new land. They don't have much but they are determined to thrive. However, an invisible force seems to be guiding them. Will this force help guide them to success or doom them?

In this city-building game you will need to indirectly guide your people as they are your primary resource. Keeping them happy and healthy will allow them to expand and make your town bigger. Expanding your town will increase the needs of the people. Explore the land, discover new resources, optimize your production setups, keep the growing demands of your populace met, deal with disasters, and make decisions that direct the development of the society.

The people take on jobs to collect or produce the resources as needed. You will have to manage their developing needs for food, water, shelter, community, faith, possessions, and security.

As the invisible force guiding these people you get to make all the decisions. You even have some limited influence over the world as you can move the structures of your people at will. This ability allows you to continue optimizing for better synergies and efficiency of your production.
